website_summaries.verdict: The VAIO Z Flip is a pricey premium convertible-hybrid laptop that will primarily appeal to graphic artists and hobbyists who need computing power and a versatile screen.
pros: More than 12 hours of battery life
cons: Power plug too easy to detach

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Surface Pro, Ipad Pro and Cintiq Companion for illustration.
customer_reviews.text: As an illustrator, all I've wanted is a lag free machine that I could take with me on the road. I was using a Surface Pro 3 8gb i5 before and it was frustrating to use because of the pen lag. I took a chance and ordered the Vaio and I immediately listed the SP3 on Ebay after testing it for an hour. The thicker pen feels a lot better and there is NO lag at all. It's a bit heavier, the kickstand isn't as good as the Surface, but it's still very good and functional. Screen is brighter and the colors are truer. Build quality is very good. Cheaper than the Surface Pro 4, which still has pen lag.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Samonte

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a problem with internal wireless adapter. COMPUTER IS DEAD.
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of nice features but sometimes it will not connect to the internet as if the intrenal wireless adapter is malfunctioning. When I go to control panel, Canvas cannot find any networks even though more than ten are available. Other devices will connect at the same time that the Vaio Canvas Z will not. This is driving me crazy. Update March 2017. Canvas Z now is dead and useless. Power button is green but screen is completely black. The charger power light is on but when I plug into computer the orange light on the computer does not shine. The Vaio only has 12 month warranty. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hybrid
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best computer I have ever owned. I got really into Vaio with my vaio tap 22 back when it was owned by Sony, I really liked that desktop so I decided to give it a try with with the Canvas Z. This hybrid has enormous power. Contrary to what people are saying, the battery lasts around 5 to 6 hours heavily using programs like Corel Draw, Pymol and OriginLab at the same time. The stylus could be more responsive but that is a minor thing and doesnt not bother me. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Stylus
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is with the pen/stylus holder. The stylus keeps slipping out of the pen holder so I used the pen clip to latch on to the holder. At some point the stylus snapped see attached picture. The stylus is poorly designed. The manufacturer did not accept my complaint nor do they have any stock for replacement which is frustrating otherwise the laptop is good but a little heavier than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing..
customer_reviews.text: After much research I decided on the Vaio Z Canvas over the Surface Pro 4. It was a great decision. This machine is fabulous for my needs. As an architect I love that I can take it to a job site and show renderings and 3d fly thrus to the contractor and subs helping explain the plans. The detachable keyboard allows me to work with a mouse or stylus and type in commands with ease. It is fast, the screen is stunning and it was money well spent. The only negative is the weight is more than the SP ... but I have no problem with it. You will be pleased if you buy this tablet.
